events.name: Nixon Shock / Dollar Devaluation
events.description: End of gold convertibility, wage-price controls, 10% import surcharge. Bretton Woods collapses.

events.name: 1973 Oil Crisis / OPEC Embargo
events.description: OPEC oil embargo quadruples prices. Stagflation begins. Market believes Fed cannot solve both inflation and recession.

events.name: 1974 Bear Market Bottom
events.description: S&P falls 48% from peak. Worst recession since Depression. Franklin National Bank fails. Faith in Fed at nadir.

events.name: Volcker Shock / 1980 Recession
events.description: Volcker raises Fed Funds to 20%. Intentional recession to break inflation. Markets question Fed resolve.

events.name: 1981-82 Double-Dip Recession
events.description: Worst unemployment since Depression (10.8%). Penn Square Bank fails. Continental Illinois crisis begins.

events.name: Continental Illinois / Too Big to Fail
events.description: 7th largest US bank fails. FDIC introduces TBTF doctrine. First modern systemic rescue.

events.name: Black Monday 1987
events.description: Largest one-day percentage decline in history (-22.6%). Greenspan provides immediate liquidity.

events.name: Asian Financial Crisis
events.description: Thai baht devaluation triggers Asian currency crisis, contagion to global EM

events.name: Russian Default / LTCM Crisis
events.description: Russian debt default triggers LTCM near-collapse, Fed orchestrates bailout

events.name: Dot-com Bubble Peak
events.description: NASDAQ peaks at 5,048, tech bubble begins deflating

events.name: September 11 Attacks
events.description: Terrorist attacks close markets, Fed provides massive liquidity

events.name: Corporate Scandals (Enron/WorldCom)
events.description: Enron and WorldCom bankruptcies, market reaches post-dot-com lows

events.name: Pre-GFC Build-up
events.description: Credit spreads compressed to historic lows, housing bubble peak

events.name: BNP Paribas Freeze
events.description: BNP Paribas freezes redemptions, subprime contagion begins

events.name: Bear Stearns Collapse
events.description: Bear Stearns fails, Fed facilitates JPMorgan acquisition

events.name: Lehman Brothers / Global Financial Crisis Peak
events.description: Lehman bankruptcy, systemic crisis, markets freeze globally

events.name: Flash Crash
events.description: Intraday 9% S&P 500 decline, high-frequency trading breakdown

events.name: European Sovereign Debt Crisis
events.description: Periphery sovereign spreads spike, TARGET2 imbalances peak, Draghi 'whatever it takes'

events.name: US Debt Ceiling / Downgrade
events.description: S&P downgrades US to AA+, VIX spikes, equity selloff

events.name: Taper Tantrum
events.description: Fed signals QE tapering, EM capital flight, 'Fragile Five' under pressure

events.name: China Devaluation
events.description: PBOC devalues yuan, triggers global equity selloff, commodity rout

events.name: Volmageddon
events.description: VIX ETF implosion, short vol blowup, XIV termination

events.name: Q4 2018 Selloff / Fed Pivot
events.description: Fed tightening + QT, S&P 500 down 20%, Christmas Eve low, Powell pivots

events.name: COVID-19 Pandemic
events.description: Global pandemic, fastest bear market ever, all asset class selloff, Fed unlimited QE

events.name: UK Pension Crisis / Rate Shock
events.description: Mini-budget chaos, gilt yields spike, BoE intervenes, LDI crisis

events.name: SVB / Regional Banking Crisis
events.description: Silicon Valley Bank fails, Signature Bank fails, Credit Suisse absorbed

events.name: Yen Carry Trade Unwind
events.description: BoJ hikes, yen surges 3% in days, unwinds global carry trades, Nikkei -12% single day
